Trade/Device Name(s): ImmunoCAP Allergen e227, Allergen Component rEqu c 1, Horse
ImmunoCAP Allergen e228, Allergen Component rFel d 4, Cat
ImmunoCAP Allergen f351, Allergen component rPen a 1, Tropomyosin, Shrimp
ImmunoCAP Allergen f354, Allergen component rBer e 1, Brazil nut
ImmunoCAP Allergen f419, Allergen component rPru p 1, PR-10, Peach
ImmunoCAP Allergen f420, Allergen component rPru p 3, LTP, Peach
ImmunoCAP Allergen f421, Allergen component rPru p 4, Profilin, Peach
ImmunoCAP Allergen w231, Allergen component nArt v 1, Mugwort
ImmunoCAP Allergen w233, Allergen component nArt v 3, LTP, Mugwort
Analyte(s): IgE specific to rPen a 1 (Tropomyosin, Shrimp)
IgE specific to rBer e 1 (Brazil nut)
IgE specific to rPru p 1 (PR-10, Peach)
IgE specific to rPru p 3 (LTP, Peach)
IgE specific to rPru p 4 (Profilin, Peach)
IgE specific to nArt v 3 (LTP, Mugwort)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ImmunoCAP Specific IgE assay and 9 new allergen components for quantitative measurement of allergen-specific IgE in human serum or plasma using Phadia instruments
Indications for Use Summary: Aid in clinical diagnosis of IgE-mediated allergic disorders by quantitatively measuring allergen-specific IgE in human serum or plasma (EDTA or Na-Heparin) using Phadia 100, Phadia 250, or Phadia 1000 in clinical laboratories
